allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fanvue Post Creator with AI content idea generator

- Gradio app with 4 tabs: Settings, New Post, History, Content Ideas
- AI-powered caption generation \(GPT-4o\) for photos and videos
- Content idea generator: 7-30 day plans with seasonal themes, PPV ideas
- CSV export of content plans \(utf-8-sig for Excel compatibility\)
- Cross-tab integration: use generated idea directly in New Post tab
- Fanvue API integration for media upload and post creation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
